1.content:
"And while I'm gone, please clean the attic" Cameron's mother said as she was walking out the door. "Other than that I love you and I'll see you in a week"

"Yeah, bye Mom" Cameron said as the door closed.

He decided to just bum around for a bit, but then he got bored.

"Eh, why not clean the attic?" he said.

He walked up the dusty ladder and turned the lights on. He looked around and saw a bright red treasure chest. It was dusty, but it looked expensive. He walked over to it and saw on the lock there were two letters transcribed. They were C and J. He knew that his mother's maiden name was Jameson and that his grandmother's name was Caroline. This must be hers. He noticed that the key was attached to the lock. He took it and he put it in. He opened the chest and inside were a bunch of clothes and shoes, probably his grandmother's. There was also a note. Cameron picked it up and read it out loud.

"To my dearest family, these are my prize possessions of clothing and I want them to be passed down to my daughter and then to her daughter and so on. That is my wish. They have great meaning to me." he said puzzled. "Daughter? I guess that means Kate"

Kate was his older sister who went off to college a few years ago.

"I wonder why she never saw this stuff." Cameron said reaching into the chest to grab something.

What does he pick out?

Mom nodded, “Okay. I promise I will unlock you from that body right away once we are home.”

choices: Mom suggests wearing something from the Attic
12323212111.content:
When they got home, Gretchen took off her shoes and tights. Mom used the key to unlock her legs. After hearing a ‘click’ Cameron’s hairy 19 year old boy’s legs appeared underneath the Gretchen dress. Cameron Grew almost 2 feet with the added length of his legs back. Next, Mom told him to take the dress off so it didn’t rip when his body was unlocked. After hearing the ‘click’ again, the rest of Cameron’s body, torso and arms grew back to their normal male size. Cameron grabbed his crotch with a sigh of relief, “It’s nice to have my manhood back!”

Cam laughed at hearing his voice was still that of a little girl. He still had Gretchen’s head. Mom finally unlocked the headband and Cam’s normal head and hair finally appeared. Now fully himself, Cam felt his body in relief that he was back to normal.

Mom threw Cameron a towel and joked, “Ahem…! Go put some clothes on please.”

Cameron smiled, “Gladly! I can’t wait to wear a pair of pants again!” Cameron ran into his room and put on jeans and a tshirt. He took a few minutes to get reacquainted with his male body. He went to the bathroom and loved being able to stand up again to pee.

Later that evening, Cam grabbed his car keys and told Mom, “It’s Friday night! I’m going to go catch up with my friends at the movies! See you later!”
12323212111.title: Taking off the Gretchen body

123232121111.content:
The following morning, Cameron was lying on the couch. He stayed out late with his friends and fell asleep on the couch playing video games. There was a knock on the door. Cameron yawned and scratched his balls on the way to answer it. He opened the door and saw a woman standing there. Cameron said, “Uh…Hi…Can I help you?”

The woman replied, “Yes. I’m Debbie Smith, your mother’s boss. We just live a few blocks away and little Abigail mentioned how much fun she had with your cousin Gretchen yesterday at daycare.”

Cameron was so groggy from waking up that he didn’t notice the little girl standing next to Debbie. Cameron looked down and recognized Abby. “Uh oh. What is she doing here?” he thought.

Before Cameron could reply, Mom came up from behind the door. She was equally nervous to why her own boss was stopping by on a Saturday morning. Mom asked, “Ms. Smith? I thought I heard your voice?”

Ms. Smith smiled, “Please call me Debbie. We are outside of work.” Mom loved the fact she could call her boss by her first name. Mom nodded, “Okay Debbie. Uh…What’s going on?”

Debbie continued, “I know it’s early to stop by on a Saturday. But Abby had so much fun with Gretchen yesterday that she wanted to see if they could play today. I didn’t know how long you were watching Gretchen though. Is she still staying with you?”

Cameron quickly replied, “No” at the same time Mom replied, “Yes.” Debbie was confused at hearing the different answers. Mom quickly made an excuse, “Uh….Can you give us a moment?”

Mom shut the front door and immediately Cameron whispered, “No way Mom! I know what you are thinking! I’m not becoming Gretchen again just to play with Abby!”

Mom whispered back, “Before you say no, just hear me out! This is a great opportunity for me! I’d love to do my boss a favor! Things at work haven’t exactly been going that great. This would give me a chance to get to know her better. I’ve never socialized with her outside of work. This would really help my career! Can you please put the Gretchen suit on and play with Abby? It would really mean a lot for me!”

Cameron started walking away and whispered back, “No way! I’m not becoming a little girl again!”

Mom stopped him, “Pleeeease! I promise to make it worth your while! What do you want? Money? A new video game?”

Cameron’s interest was sparked. He whispered back to Mom and said, “I’ll do it for a car!”

Mom let out a whispering shriek, “A car? I’m not buying you a car for a few hours of work! A video game is my final offer!” Mom turned back to the door and waited for Cameron’s response.

Cameron started thinking. He realized sacrificing a few hours of his Saturday might be worth pretending to be Gretchen for a new video game. Plus, it would be helping his Mom’s career. Cameron whispered to Mom, “I’ll do it if I can go to the store right after being Gretchen is over.”

Mom smiled, “Deal! Hurry up and put the Gretchen suit on! I’ll be right up with the keys to lock the suit in place. In the mean time, I’ll let Debbie and Abigail inside.”
123232121111.title: Surprise visitor in the morning

choices: I need you to try on the outfits I found in the chest
I need you to stay at Gretchen a little longer
1232321211112.content:
While Mom let Debbie and Abby in, Cameron ran upstairs to the attic to get changed. It was a familiar routine by now, put on the tights, dress, and headband, and change into Gretchen. He was just finishing up, when Mom came to check on him. "Ready to go?" She asked.

"Yeah!" Cameron replied, in Gretchen's voice. Mom reached around and locked the outfit on. "Hey, what was that for?" Cameron asked.

"You know, just in case" She said. "Don't want any accidents in front of my boss." Or maybe she had other plans...

Gretchen joined Abby downstairs, and they went to play in the living room. Abby had brought some toys, since she knew Gretchen was from out of town and might not have any. Cameron played along, first playing dolls with Abby, before moving on to watching some TV on the couch. The dolls were mind numbingly boring, but TV was okay. He got a kick out of being so small, it was interesting to see the world from that perspective. His legs didn't even dangle off the end of the couch. He could hear his mom and Ms. Smith talking in the next room. Something about life, a new thing at work, the usual. Cameron continued playing the part, until it was time for Abby to leave. Her mom came and got her, and you said your goodbyes.

"Thanks for this!" Ms. Smith said. "Abby had a great time. Maybe we'll do it again sometime?"

"Of course!" Mom said. "Take care Debbie, bye Abby!" She closed the door behind them.

"You know, it was a little boring but it wasn't too bad" Cameron said. "I am looking forward to changing back to normal now though."

"Not just yet..." Mom said.

"What? What do you mean not yet? I did what you asked, let me out!"

"Don't worry, I will. But first..."
1232321211112.title: Cameron becomes Gretchen

12323212111122.content:
Mom tells you, “I need you to stay as Gretchen for a bit longer.”

You cross your arms and look up at Mom. You stomp your leg and demand, “I did my part of the deal! Now it’s your turn to keep your word! You promised if I agreed to become ‘Gretchen’ that we could go to the store right away and buy me a new video game!”

Mom couldn’t help but crack a grin at seeing you complain, “That pout is precious! Relax..I promised you we would go to the store right away….And we will.”

You sigh relief and say, “Cool. So why can’t you unlock me from this body then?”

Mom explains, “Since we are going to already be at the mall…It makes sense to get ‘Gretchen’ another outfit while we are there.” Mom gave a nervous smile and muttered, “I sort of already agreed to bringing Gretchen over to Abby’s next weekend. I figured you would be up for it again…Right?”

You look up at Mom and think. Pretending to be Gretchen for a few hours today earned you a new video game. You could handle another boring few hours if you got something out of it. You reply, “Hmmm…..That depends. Same deal? I get another new game?”

Mom thinks for a moment and nods, “Sure.”

You smile, “Then it’s a Deal!”
12323212111122.title: I need you to stay at Gretchen a little longer

123232121111221.content:
Once you are at the mall, Mom takes you to the kid’s clothing store. You are bored out of your mind as she makes you try on a few new dresses for the party next weekend. There are other girls and Mom’s at the store and you laugh seeing how difficult of a time the other Mom’s are having. Their little girls are whining and crying. It’s funny to watch the other’s struggle to find the perfect dress. Finally, Mom finds one she likes on you and you buy it without any distraction. You are mostly excited to get a new video game once this dress shopping nonsense is over.

Like Mom promised, you immediately go to the video game store afterwards. You know exactly what you are looking for. It’s a new first person shooter game that all your friends have. You bring it up to the checkout counter with Mom and the salesman looks at you funny. The salesman examines the video game and tells your Mom, “I’m sorry, but I can’t sell you this game in good conscious. It’s rated M for mature. There is no way your daughter can play this game.”

Your Mom looks down at you and giggles. She answers, “Uh…She isn’t my daughter. …She is my…uh..Niece.”

The salesman replies, “..Even more of a reason not to buy it for her. Her parents will be very mad if she brings home that game.” The salesman brings you to a shelf of kids games and pulls one off the shelf, “Try this one. She will love it. It’s a dress-up game that’s perfect for a girl her age.”

You glare at your Mom as she examines the game. She looks at you and whispers, “I promised you a new video game right? I never said what type of video game.” She winks at you again and you watch as Mom pays for the kids game.

On the way home, you groan, “I can’t believe you bought me this stupid game! What am I supposed to do with this?”

Mom looks in the rear view mirror at you and jokes, “Give it a try! It might be fun. I read the back and it says you can design dresses for a wedding…prom..tea party…” Mom winks again and says, “Most girls your age would love that game! Maybe you could show Abby how to play!”

You glare back at her. You can’t wait to get home and take off the Gretchen body.
123232121111221.title: Shopping

choices: She threw away the original Gretchen clothes.
She wanted to experiment with the Gretchen clothes more.
123232121111222.content:
That Saturday, you woke up as you normally did, stretching from the bed at around noon. You leaned over the edge of your bed, dangling your girly legs as you struggled to find your oversized slippers. You yawned and shuffled around your room, still not yet used to just how large everything still was around you.

You walked past the new pile of clothes you and your mother had collected the previous week and made your way downstairs. As usual, your mother and sister, Katie, were eating lunch.

"Morning, pumpkin," she your mother as she rose from her chair. "I made you some waffles, if you'd like."

"Thanks," you mumbled and took your usual seat at the table.

Katie giggled as she watched you struggle to climb up the seat. Ever since you had agreed to remain as Gretchen until the weekend after shopping, your mother had requested you remain as her while around the house. For every day you remained locked up as Gretchen, you earned yourself another video game. You had gotten used to being a little girl, as weird as it was.

You munched on your food, eating far less of it than you normally would had if you were in boy form. As the table was cleared, you cleared your throat.

"So, Mom," you said. "We got me a lot of clothes already and figured out how to keep me locked so that I stay as Gretchen even when I'm not wearing the outfit...When can I go back to normal?"

By locking the clothes, you had found that removing the outfit still kept your trapped as a little girl As a result, you could wear whatever clothes you wanted and you wouldn't change back. To return to normal, you'd have to wear the original Gretchen clothes again and unlock them.

"Oh," began you mother...
123232121111222.title: Getting Used to it

1232321211112221.content:
Oh...um, I threw away the original Gretchen's clothes"

"Oh o...WHAT?!" she started shaking her head "No no no no no"

"Mom how could you?"

She was surprised at what was happening she had been so sure "I'm sorry" the two siblings looked at her "I thought I was right that you wouldn't care if you were stuck. So unless one of you didn't take it out the original clothes are in the trash bag by the door"
1232321211112221.title: Truth or Trick

12323212112.content:
You aren’t happy about having to be strapped into a carseat and can’t wait to get home to get out of the Gretchen body. As your mother drives home, you come to a red light. While waiting, your mother looks over and realizes they are close to your father’s office building. She notices Dad’s car parked in the lot. Mom looks at you in the rear view mirror with a devious grin, “Are you up for some investigative fun?”

You know when your mother gets an idea that she always sticks to it. You figure it would be faster to get home and back to your regular body if you go along with whatever Mom has planned. You tell her, “What do you mean by investigative fun?”

“As you know, your father is supposed to be on a month long business trip. But he is obviously at his office building because his car is there. I have the feeling he is up to something again with his inventions and wanted to keep it a secret. What do you say we pay your father a visit?”

“Right now? Like this?” You say pointing to your 5 year old girl’s body.

“Yep! Trust me, this just might work out perfect!” You wonder what Mom’s plan is. You take the elevator to Dad’s floor and walk to his office. You were surprised to see the lights were on. You peeked through the window and saw a woman in a business skirt sitting at Dad’s desk. “Who is that? Why is she sitting at Dad’s desk?” You whisper to your Mom.

Mom replies, “I’m not sure….” Just then, your mother recognizes what the woman is wearing and makes a strange face, “…What the??? Whoever she is… she is wearing one of my business outfits!!??” Mom looks around further and recognizes one of her old purses on the floor and says, “How the…She has my old purse too?”

You are confused, “Huh? Why would Dad give her your clothes and old purse?” You watch the woman sitting at Dad’s lean back in her chair. She takes a break from her computer and picks up a tennis ball. She starts bouncing it off the wall to herself. You and Mom look at each other with wide eyes. This was exactly what Dad always did when he was thinking. Next, the woman grabbed a pencil and started twirling it fast around her palm in the exact way Dad always does.

You and Mom look at each other with the same smirk. Mom giggles, “There’s no doubt that’s him! He must be testing some sort of new disguise.”

You ask, “If it’s anything like the Gretchen disguise I’m wearing right now, why doesn’t he just unlock it? He could take it off at night and come home. Why did he lie and say he was gone for a month?”

“If I know your father, he probably is doing some testing on his invention. But we need to know the truth. Go in there and say hi to your father. I’m sure he will be shocked to see ‘Gretchen’ walking into his office. That way we can get some honest answers.”
12323212112.title: Mom has an idea and stops somewhere first

123232122.content:
Mom was beaming as she escorted you out of the office building. "I owe you one, kiddo." Smiling, she said. "I really needed the day off so to get a jump start on the weekend." She snapped her fingers, grinning. "I know! I'll reward you with some new clothes for your new look!"

"Your kidding, right?" Taken back, you asked. "You know the second you take these items off, I become myself again."

Mom smiled down at you like a python would a rat, making you nervous. "Gretchen did not always visit wearing that same dress." Amused, she said. "So when you transformed into that little cutie, I took a closer look at the locks. There is a third key setting, allowing the wearer to change clothing. I'm guessing the original outfit is needed to return to normal."

"You mean, you can take these clothes off, keeping me like this?" Disturbed, you demanded. You blushed horribly. "You wouldn't dare!"

Mom laughed. "Where is your sense of adventure... young lady?" Grinning, she asked. "I think having Gretchen around for a little while would be fun."

"Fun for you, maybe." Pouting, you countered. "This is blackmail and you know it!"

"I can make it worth your while if you play along." Cooing you, mom said. "You know you want to be a 'big girl'; now we know we can make that happen."

You blushed at that, knowing you had openly said you wanted to try on that strange bra. "How long do you plan to keep me like this?" Frustrated, you asked.

"Just for the weekend." Lightly, mom replied. "After that, we'll let you become a teenage girl for a while and go shopping with your sister as her cousin or something."

"If I agree to this, I want the keys back after the end of the weekend." Firmly, you demanded. "I won't be my sisters dress-up doll."

Mom nodded. "Fair enough." Smiling, she said. "For now, however, you are my little cousin and I expect you to visit from time to time since I am about to spoil you with a shopping spree."

"Oh rapture..." Rolling your eyes, you said.

Mom giggled then called your sister as she dragged you towards the car.

Later...
123232122.title: Mom's discovery leads to trouble.

choices: Your sister takes you somewhere else
1232321221.content:
30 minutes later, Mom gathered a handful of clothes for you to try on. You were a bit surprised that Mom went into the changing room with you. As you started to remove the Gretchen dress you wore in, you looked up at Mom, “Are you sure that I’m completely locked in this body? I’m not suddenly going to morph into my normal male body am I?” You were a bit concerned if you took off all the Gretchen clothes that you’d suddenly be standing there naked in your teenaged boy’s body in front of your mother.

Mom nodded, “I’m sure you are locked in safe. Like I mentioned before, I used the 3rd set of keys to make sure. You can take all of the Gretchen clothes off if you wanted, and you’d still be her. That’s a good thing too because you’ll need to take everything off to try on these swimsuits.”

You eyed the pile of swimsuits that Mom grabbed and asked, “Why do I need a swimsuit? I thought I only agreed to stay as Gretchen until the end of the weekend?”

Mom explained, “You also promised to make appearances every now and then as Gretchen since I’m spoiling my niece with a shopping spree. And trust me, it’s the middle of the summer and you will be glad to have the proper attire to hit the pool.”

You nod, “Fine. Let’s start with them to get it overwith.” Mom pulled your dress over your head and you slowly remove the Gretchen panties worried you will suddenly turn back into a guy. Once you slid the panties all the way down your ankles and wiggled them off, you were relieved that you stayed in Gretchen form. As Mom held the pink one-piece swimsuit legs open for you to step in, you got the first glance of your naked female body. Even though you knew what was in between your legs, it was the first time you caught a glimpse of Gretchen’s girlhood. It was eerie to see a tiny vagina instead of your normal manly member. After stepping into the legs of the swimsuit, Mom pulled it up tight for you. It was snug around your butt and she pulled the shoulder straps over. The tight spandex seemed like a second skin as you tugged on the material, “I think it’s too tight.” Mom shook her head, “It’s prefect. It’s supposed to fit like that! There’s no need to try on the other sizes.” Mom undid the shoulder straps and helped you pull the one-piece off. You slipped back into the Gretchen panties as Mom handed you a pair of pants. You were relieved to finally wear something other than a dress. But as you looked closer, they weren’t really pants. They were a pair of leggings with flowers down the side. Just like the swimsuit, the leggings were so tight they felt like a second skin. She pulled a matching top over your head and was pleased at how everything fit.

An hour later, you were standing next to Mom at the check-out counter. There was already 5 bags full of new clothes for your Gretchen body. You were surprised at how many supplies Mom got for you. You were wearing a new short poofy play skirt with a yellow top. You also had a matching hairband and a new pair of shoes. You were hoping to wear one of the pairs of shorts Mom bought instead. They were the least girly clothes she bought for you. But the poofy play skirt was surprisginly comfortable and you liked how it allowed airflow. It was hot outside and it would be nice to have a breeze in-between your legs.

As you walked towards the mall exit, you noticed your sister approaching with a huge smile. You looked up at Mom and asked, “What is SHE doing here?” Mom explained, “I’m meeting up with some friends so your sister agreed to take over from here.”

Your sister came up and gave you a huge hug, “Awww. You look soooo cute!” You could feel your face turning red as you managed to smile, “Uhh..Thanks.” Mom took the bags of your new clothes to the car and handed your sister some money, "Thanks for taking over. See you later back at the house.”

You asked your sister, “What did she mean by that? Aren’t I done shopping yet?”

Your sister nodded, “For clothing, yes. But there is one last thing you need to complete your look.” You curiously walked along with your sister as she stopped in front of a jewelry store. She took your hand and smiled, “It’s time to get your ears pierced! Come on!” She led you inside as you whispered, “Are you serious?” Your sister whispered back, “Trust me. You’ll thank me later once you notice all the other girls your age already have their ears pierced.” You tried to complain, “I’m only going to be Gretchen for a few more days. What do I care if my ears are pierced or not?” Your sister whispered back, “From what Mom told me about your agreement, ‘Gretchen’ will be making periodic appearances whenever she wants you to become her. So you may as well look cute while you are a girl. Come on! It doesn’t even hurt. You’ll hardly know it even happened!” You gulp as she pulls you into the jewelry store.
1232321221.title: Shopping at the mall.

choices: I told them about the disguises.
There are a lot of girls named Gretchen.
with a grin. She has something planned.
12323212212.content:
You quickly found that, as a little girl, all of the little freedoms you had taken for granted were now gone, stripped from you completely. Katie nearly threw you into a chair at the jewelry store and pointed out a pair of pierced earrings that looked like large, sparking pink roses. "Don't I get a say?" Gulping, you squeaked.

"Aw, you're so cute, trying to be little miss independent." Teasing, Katie said. She patted your head, making you blush. "Maybe when you are a little older, we'll let you pick out a few things for yourself."

The salesladies and a few of of the patrons giggled slightly as you pouted even more. "Just wait until 'Cameron' comes back.." Threatening, you whispered.

Katie smiled and whispered back, "It'll be worth the pounding for the fun I'm going to have with you... Gretchen."

Your blood turned cold at the sight of your sister's evil grin just before the saleslady announced that your ears had been pierced. Katie paid for the earrings then half carried, half dragged you out back into the main corridor of the mall. "Where are you taking me now?" Worried, you asked.

"To meet my friends." Grinning, Katie replied. She then giggled and added, "We had been hanging out since we were little kids ourselves, they all know Gretchen."

You turned pale. "Wouldn't they get suspicious, seeing me as I'm still a 'little girl'?" Wincing, you asked.

Katie laughed, making your heart sink as she replied...
12323212212.title: Life as a little girl

choices: At home, mom tries a disguise.
123232122123.content:
Katie laughed, making your heart sink as she replied with silence. You knew she had something planned which put you near panic mode. Only Katie looked down into your horrified eyes. "Calm down, sweetie." Cooing, she said. "Here's the deal... you play along with mom and I while we have our fun this weekend and we'll open your eyes to the world of teenage girls no mere boy will ever understand. If you decline, we won't push you any further but agreeing means no turning back."

You hesitated. The aspect of discovering how girls ticked caught your attention but you were uncertain how Katie planned to pass you off to her friends as Gretchen. Still, to learn all that teenage girls have to deal with through the eyes of one was too exciting, to frightening to pass up. You silently nodded, agreeing to your sister's little game. Katie looked at you, rather surprised then grinned as she spotted her four friends. All of them were girls near your original age of seventeen. First was Rachel Moore, a tall and slender girl with long black hair and blue eyes. She looked at you in surprise before turning to Katie. "Who's the cutie?" Smiling, she asked. "She looks a lot like Gretchen Wild, the kid we played with when we were all around six."

"This is Gretchen Wild." Somewhat honestly, Katie said. "Her family had moved away without a word when they discovered she had a condition that prevents her from outwardly aging."

Rachel's eyes went wide. "No way...!" Gasping, she said. "That's insane! You look exactly like I remember you!"

"Hey, guys." Nervously, you said. "Long time no see..."

The second girl, Amy Dove, a very petite girl with doll like features, long blond hair and green eyes looked at you with a sense of pity. "That really sucks." Wincing, she said. "I know what its like to be short but to always look like a kid..." She shuddered at the thought before giving you a hug. "You had to have had a rough life, I'm sorry."

"I- I get by." Shrugging, you said. "Katie's teasing isn't making it easy, though."

The girls turned to Katie with unimpressed expressions to which Katie replied. "She's too cute not to tease."

The third girl, Susan Barn giggled. She was near your height, as a seventeen year old boy, with shoulder length brown hair and brown eyes. "You have a point there." Bemused, she said. "The pink sparkle rose earrings make her look adorable!"

"Katie picked them out." Pouting, you said.

"I'm hoping to remind Gretchen of all the fun we had together as kids." Smiling, Katie said. "I'm thinking a little girl bonding will help."

"Sounds good." Smiling, the last girl said. Her name was Zoe Parr. She was of average size with long red hair an green eyes." She giggled. "though I doubt the club will let her in, even with an ID."

You turned to Katie, wondering if she and mom had planned that far ahead. To your shock and somewhat horror, Katie pointed to the bag mom insisted you carry with you upon leaving the house. Sure enough, you had a fake ID to go with your tiny female body. You began to wonder if mom and Katie knew about dad's disguises long before this.
123232122123.title: with a grin. She has something planned.

choices: You get kicked out of the teenage club
You hook up with a guy
1232321221231.content:
Your sister's quick thinking makes you feel better about inhabiting the body of a tiny girl. All her friends think you have some sort of disease that inhibited your aging. They all believe you are really an 18 year old girl like the rest of your sister's friends. You even have an ID that your Mom conveniently made for you. Amy crouches down to your level and asks, "Why do you still dress like a little girl if you are really 18?"

You defend your new identity and quickly reply, "It's not exactly easy to find trendy clothes in a size 8T."

Rachel suggests, "There's gotta be something that you can fit into that doesn't make it look like you are still in kindergarten. Come with me. I'll find you a cute top and a pair of skinny jeans to make you feel better."

You follow along as Rachel brings you into a hipster store designed for teenage girls. She holds up the smallest top to your body with a groan realizing you aren't going to fit into anything. She brings you back to the children's section at a department store and finds a cute pair of leggings, "Wear these! They will make you look older and show off your curves."

You emerge from the dressing room wearing the leggings. You feel like a dwarf among your sister's friends who have mature bodies. Amy pats your butt explaining "You gotta wear a thong with skinny jeans so your panty lines are hidden."

You point to the little girl panties that fit your current body, "Good luck finding a thong. Everything that fits me has a cartoon princess on it."

Moments later, Rachel comes back with a thong that's your size, "I found this in the training bra section. At least it's one solid color. It might fit you!"

You are amazed to find out the thong fits properly and conceals any panty lines under your leggings. Rachel hands you the smallest bra you've ever seen and says, "Try this on. If you want to pass as a teenager you gotta wear a bra."

You feel ridiculous wearing a training bra underneath your top designed for a 5 year old girl. You top has glittery letters across the front that reads, "Girlz Rule." Amy stuffs silicone breast-forms into your bra and smiles, "There you go! Now you are starting to look like you are older!" Rachel lifts you up and places you on the makeup counter telling the worker, "She's really 18. Give her the works!"

After asking for your ID, the woman agrees to put makeup on your face. You are pleased to see she made you look like a teenager.

Amy, Rachel and your sister Katie are pleased with your look. Rachel grabs you hand saying, "Come on girlfriend. Let's hit the clubs! It's time you found out what being a teenage girl is like!"

Katie comes up behind you and tugs on your hair, "Hold on. You gotta lose those pig tails before we go fishing for guys!" Katie grabs a brush and sculpts your hair into a trendy look for a teenage girl. You join all her friends with a 'mean-girl' flare to your step.
1232321221231.title: Bonding with 'old frinds'

1232322.content:
"Take off those clothes and hand them to me." You take them off, and your male body pops out. You put on your normal clothes. "Now, help me bring these downstairs." You and Mom carry the chest downstairs into the living room. "Katie is on her way, in the meantime, let's see what we're dealing with." The two of you look through the bags of clothes in the chest. It has almost any type of clothing, from clothes like Gretchen's all the way up to what looked like a young woman's clothes.

"You know, your father isn't gonna be home for a few days since he's on a business trip, we could have some fun with these!"

"Actually Mom, I kinda just wanted to try on the bra, that's it" You say. She finally let's you try it on. It clicks, and out grow two boobs. It felt wild, you played around with them for a while before taking them off. That's when Katie walked in.

1521.content:
The way they caught the light, had Cameron wondering if the earrings were real diamonds. Holding them up, in the torch light, they looked expansive. The light fracturing into a rainbow, the gold woven around them was detailed, and also looked expensive.

Spotting a full-length mirror, Cameron took them over. Pulling the dust-cloth revealed the mirror properly. Leaning close until his nose was inches from the surface, Cameron smirked to himself.

Holding them up to his ears, he shifted his grip until it looked as if his ears were pierced. The earrings were restrained in their design, a simplicity that spoke of grace and refinement. The longer he looked the more feminine they appeared.

Hardly surprising, he told himself. Earrings weren't for men, well, not when these were put up here.

His thoughts scattered, as he felt two sharp, stings. His hands recoiling at the pain, Cameron was startled to see the earrings were now fixed in place. His earlobes, now proudly wearing them.

Half-afraid of being stung once more. His fingers tentatively returned to the earrings. Confirming what his eyes told him... His ears were pierced now, and decorated with the earrings.

Unsure, how it could have happened, he tried to tell himself the hook was sharp. He told himself, that he'd accidentally stabbed himself with them. Unaware of their proximity, he'd done it himself.

Deep down... and well, not very deep down, Cameron wasn't entirely convinced by his own logic.
1521.title: Diamond earings

15211.content:
"And so it begins...."

Cameron jumped a little at the sudden voice. Who said that? The voice sounded really soft, distinctly feminine, but unlike anything Cameron had heard before.

"Hello?" he spoke out, turning his head a little, the glistening earrings moving with him as he did.

There was no one else he could see in the attic, really making him wonder where that had come from. Was he going crazy? He had been alone in the house many times before with no problem. Hopefully he wasn't going paranoid at everything, although the unusual earrings were certainly unnerving in their own right.

"Maybe I need to take a break," he sighed.

Still, he could do with getting a little more done up here, although a little reprieve sounded really nice right now. If nothing else than to get him out of the dark space.

15212.content:
The sting as the earrings went in, startled a high yelp from Cameron. His hands recoiling, he half expected them to drop to the attic floor. However, they just remained in place, making his ears flex briefly before settling.

The cautious exploration, was slowed as Cameron didn't want to get stabbed by the hooks... again!

But, as his fingers found no sharp points behind his ears. Nothing to threaten him. As he felt with more confidence, he couldn't find anything that felt like a latch, or a catch, or a hook.

Then again, he wasn't an expert on earrings, either. His fingers fumbled, the back felt like it was decorative, with a design stamped into it. Any details that'd allow Cameron to remove them lost in the ornate design. The diamonds themselves seemed to shine with an unnatural brightness, drawing even more attention to themselves.

A distant, deep part of Cameron's mind complimented them. At least, they were stylishly simple, and not something more flamboyant.

Tugging at his hair, he tried to get it to better hide them. His hair in need of a trim, was enough to cover his ears, and with a little encouragement should be able to hide ... these.

He thought about getting to a jeweller, and seeing about getting them snipped free, and about getting through dinner without them being noticed.

Wishing it were a cooler time of year, Cameron pulled the hood up on his sweatshirt, and went downstairs.
